name: Unpuzzle: Puzzle Game
description:
Unpuzzle levels block by block until none left!

More than 1000 levels! A large number of game mechanics will make you think about solving various problems and puzzles.
At the same time, the game strikes a good balance between difficult tasks and simple puzzles, so that you can enjoy the gameplay as much as possible and swim in a state of flow and enjoy a pleasant gameplay. The game combines 2D and 3D puzzles. This colorful and addictive game will challenge your logic, critical thinking, agility and accuracy. Stretch your brain and go through hundreds of different challenges and puzzles. Learn new techniques and learn to

Complete puzzles, solve puzzles, go through hundreds and thousands of game levels. Enjoy the challenge and free puzzles, keep your intellect in good shape, relax and have fun with anti stress games.

The main functions in the game:

- relaxing gameplay
- over 1000 puzzles and puzzles
- a large number of game mechanics
- soothing gaming experience
- stream state
- relaxing music and sounds, allowing you to enjoy even more addictive gameplay and puzzles
- 3D puzzles and puzzles
- Antistress mechanics.
